mdRecord.dcterms:title: Policy of assurance for revaluation of Mount Vernon dependencies, Bushrod Washington, 1805 August 31
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Mutual Assurance Society Against Fire on Buildings of the State of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Policy of Assurance for Bushrod Washington's Mount Vernon for loss or damage by fire with Mutual Assurance Society, Richmond, Virginia. Buildings insured were 2 Negro Quarters, Office, Smokehouse, Wash house, Carriage house, and 2 Stables ... "real sum insured" was $4576.00 ... signed by Rob't Mitchell. Document signed, 1 page.
